question.title: How to use mix:shareable on Jackrabbit Oak?
question.body:
I read the documentation of JCR that say that to share a node you should do session.getWorkspace().clone() but it throw not implemented. However mix:shareable exists, assign a jcr:UUID to the node and also, it looks like that other methods are implemented (example getSharedNodes() )

Where am I going wrong? Or simply it's not full implemented? Can anyone point me the documentation or a working example? Thanks in advice.
